detail_desc: Velour-covered hair elastic.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, and ties at the back.
Short, sleeveless, A-line dress in soft organic cotton satin. Double-layered yoke, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and gathered tiers to the hem for added width. Unlined.
Vest tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, picot trims at the top and a decorative satin bow at the front.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, front pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Lightly padded puffer jacket in a quilted weave made from recycled polyester. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Wide trousers in wide wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs with creases.

Boxy shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a double-layered, drawstring hood in cotton jersey, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and flap chest pockets with a button. Unlined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the top, long sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Coat in soft bouclé made from a wool blend in a gently rounded shape that tapers to the hem. Notch lapels, buttons down the front and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with flounces at the front and a silicone trim at the top. Cups with removable inserts, detachable, adjustable straps that tie at the back of the neck and ties at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with a round neckline and straight hem.
A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with wide flounces that run diagonally across the skirt. Square neckline and shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top. Jersey lining.
Dress knitted in a cotton blend containing some wool with a pattern knit at the top and long sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a lace trim at the hem.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and long sleeves with frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sweatshirt in soft organic cotton with a  press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 12-18 months and 18-24 months without a press-stud). Brushed inside.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy jacquard weave with a frill at the front and along the sleeves, concealed zip at the back and a seam with a wide frill at the hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and elastication at the back of the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Fully lined, 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Short-sleeved top in viscose crêpe with a round neckline and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Biker jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a decorative tab and button at the sides. Satin lining.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, marled knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and slits in the sides. No buttons.
Long shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, long sleeves, rounded, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot at the top.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Short dress in glittery jersey with sequins, with a boat neck, low dropped shoulders and long dolman sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a fitted skirt. Unlined.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.

Playsuit in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with wide shoulder straps, buttons at the top, flap chest pockets, side pockets and welt back pockets. Detachable belt at the waist and short, wide legs with creases at the front.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut jersey top with short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, ribbed turtleneck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Cold shoulder blouse in airy chiffon with narrow shoulder straps, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with elastication at the shoulders. Partly lined in jersey.
Sandals in scuba fabric with a print motif, heel straps with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Moulded ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Shirt in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Tunic in an airy weave with a rounded stand-up collar and a V-neck opening at the front. Buttons down the front, a yoke with gathers at the back to create a relaxed fit, long sleeves with rounded, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Inner top with elastication below the bust.
T-shirts in airy cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless playsuit in patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the neckline. Elasticated seam and bow at the waist and rounded, gathered side pockets.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a sweetheart neckline, long sleeves and straight hem.
Blouse in a soft weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, short, tie-hem raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles at the top and ties with a metal ring at the ends. Size 15x31x37 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a sweatshirt and joggers. Long-sleeved sweatshirt with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Wedge-heel sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9 cm.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Set with a hat, mittens and scarf in a soft rib knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up at the hem with an appliqué.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the shirt jacket is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Hairband in an airy, pleated weave with a ring at the top and covered elastication at the back.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a small, frilled collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Wide flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders to the back. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered tube scarf in cotton jersey with a pattern on the outside.
